channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Sling
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Sling

item.title: CVE-2016-5394|2024-08-06T01:00:59.903Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20sling
item.description: In the XSS Protection API module before 1.0.12 in Apache Sling, the encoding done by the XSSAPI.encodeForJSString() method is not restrictive enough and for some input patterns allows script tags to pass through unencoded, leading to potential XSS vulnerabilities.
